section.title: Real results with VisaPrep AI
section.subtitle: From first mock to embassy window—AI drills that build clarity, confidence, and composure for student visa interviews.

testimonial.title: Intuitive Mock Interview Experience
testimonial.quote: Felt like the real counter window. The body‑language tips helped me keep eye contact and answer straight to the point.
testimonial.name: Aarav Mehta

testimonial.title: Unified Coaching View
testimonial.quote: One report for speech, content, and posture means faster feedback for every student.
testimonial.name: Sophiya Poudel

testimonial.title: Easy for Institutes
testimonial.quote: We launched UK/Canada tracks in minutes. Students joined with a link—no installs.
testimonial.name: Dipesh Rana
